body:
This patch to assimp (https://github.com/assimp/assimp/pull/4203) allows qt to compile with assimp@5.1: and newer. This resolves a mutual exclusion between `dd4hep +ddcad` (which needs assimp@5.1:) and `qt +opengl` (which needs assimp@5:5.0).

Maintainer tag for qt: @sethrj
title: assimp: patch for issue that prevents 5.1: from working with qt
